short_description: Makes classification predictions based on an ensemble of weighted classifiers.
long_description: This function applies a adaboost model for predicting each of the input test data items.

input_tables.name: AttributeTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table containing the attribute names and the values of test data
input_tables.description: Specifies the name of the table containing the attribute names and the values of test data

input_tables.name: Model
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table containing the output model from adaboost_drive
input_tables.description: Specifies the name of the table containing the output model from adaboost_drive

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.rDescription: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.rDescription: The name of the database where the input table is located.
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database password of the user.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.rDescription: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.rDescription: The password for the SSL truststore.
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: ModelTableName
argument_clauses.rDescription: Indicates whether to include model object, default value is FALSE.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the previously built model table on which to base the output probabilities.

argument_clauses.name: AttrTableGroupbyColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the columns on which the attribute table is partitioned.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the columns on which the attribute table is partitioned.

argument_clauses.name: AttrTablePidColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the attribute table columns that contain the data point identifiers.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the attribute table columns that contain the data point identifiers.

argument_clauses.name: AttrTableValColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the attribute table column that contains the data point values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the attribute table column that contains the data point values.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of input_table columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of input_table columns to copy to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: OutputResponseProbDist
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies whether to output probabilities. If this value is true, you must specify the model on which to base the output probabilities, either in this argument or in the “output.response.model” argument. The model table is the name of a previously built model object.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether to output probabilities. If this value is true, you must specify the model on which to base the output probabilities, either in this argument or in the ModelTableName argument. The model_table is the name of a previously built model table.

argument_clauses.name: OutputMajorityProbability
argument_clauses.rDescription: Only output the majority label probability instead of the full vector.
argument_clauses.description: Only output the majority label probability instead of the full vector.
